ingredients.ingredient: 20 thin slices sandwich bread, crusts removed
4 ounces blue cheese, at room temperature
1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature

cookingTips: Bring cheese to room temperature for smooth, spreadable consistency
Roll bread thin with rolling pin to prevent dough from tearing during wrapping
Brush with beaten egg for golden, glossy appearance when baked
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What strategies would ensure these appetizers stay crispy and don't become soggy from the asparagus moisture?
